alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 10:10PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected Tuesday into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
